text: The Shakey's V-League 13th Season Collegiate Conference is the 26th conference of the Shakey's V-League and the second conference for its 13th season. The conference was started on July 30, 2016 at the Ynares Sports Arena with the first two games of the conference. Majority of the games will be held at the Philsports Arena, Pasig City. There are ten (10) competing teams (5 from UAAP, 4 from NCAA and 1 from ISAA) who will split into two brackets for this conference, which served as a pre-season tournament for collegiate leagues. ABS-CBN Sports+Action is covering the games live on television. ==Participating Teams== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=70|Abbr. !width=400|Group A |- ! colspan="6" style="background-color: #F2F2F2; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;" | Legend |- | style="border: 1px solid black;" align=center | G | Guest Player |- | style="border: 1px solid black;" align=center | S | Setter |- | style="border: 1px solid black;" align=center | MH | Middle Hitter |- | style="border: 1px solid black;" align=center | OH | Outside Hitter |- | style="border: 1px solid black;" align=center | OP | Opposite Hitter |- | style="border: 1px solid black;" align=center | L | Libero |- | style="background: #D0E6FF; border: 1px solid black" align=center | (c) | Team Captain |- | style="border: 1px solid black;" align=center | HC | Head Coach |- |} ==Format== The conference format as it follows: *Preliminaries :*Single round robin preliminary *Quarterfinals :*Top three teams from each group after preliminary round will enter the quarterfinal play-off round *Semifinals :*Top four teams after quarterfinals round will enter the semifinals round :*They will compete against each other in a best- of-three series as follows: Rank 1 vs Rank 4 and Rank 2 vs Rank 3. *Finals :*Best-of-three series for the Final and Bronze matches Players who are eligible to play in the conference are those who have been competed in a collegiate league, enrolled freshmen, and transferees who have completed their residency period. All teams are mandatory to add two guest players for each squad, including players who are still undergoing residency period. ==Preliminary round== ===Group A=== {| class="infobox bordered" |width=20px style="background:#ccffcc;"| ||Qualified for Quarterfinals |- |width=20px style="background:#ffcccc;"| ||Eliminated |} |} ====Match Results==== All times are Philippine Standard Time (UTC+08:00) |} ====Playoff for Quarterfinals==== |} ===Group B=== {| class="infobox bordered" |width=20px style="background:#ccffcc;"| ||Qualified for Quarterfinals |- |width=20px style="background:#ffcccc;"| ||Eliminated |} |} ====Match Results==== All times are Philippine Standard Time (UTC+08:00) |} ==Quarterfinals== {| class="infobox bordered" |width=20px style="background:#ccffcc;"| ||Qualified for Semi-Finals |- |width=20px style="background:#ffcccc;"| ||Eliminated |} |} |} ===Playoff for Semifinals=== |} ==Semifinals== * Ranking is based from the quarter finals round. * All series are best-of-3 ===Rank 1 vs Rank 4=== |} ===Rank 2 vs Rank 3=== |} ==Finals== ===Battle for Bronze=== |} ===Championship=== |} ===Individual awards=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
